Date: 2024-12-10 14:44
Subject: Request for Tory Burch Fund Allocation - Japan Fire Claim
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Furqan,

 

As discussed yesterday, kindly support in allocating the amount of SAR 328,901 to the BU Code 50Z23 (Description: CGA - TORY BURCH - STOCK & EXPENSE – RIYADH) with an accrual to you which will be offset once the insurer makes the payment. I do not want to delay Tory Burch any further.

 

Approved claim details:

 

Nasco Ref.N-MG-24-7

	
CHALHOUB GROUP ARABIA Chalhoub Group Arabia

	
Policy Number 31/MO/10465

	
Policy Number 31/MO/6023

	
Claim amount

328,901

 

Apologies for any inconvenience caused and thank you for your kind support as always.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI
